headline: Acquisitions Drive Oil Output Surge, Strengthening Outlook for Viper Energy
summary: Viper Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ:VNOM) is one of the 11 Best Dividend Stocks with a Consistent 3-Year Payout History. The company’s Q2 earnings exceeded expectations following major acquisitions. Viper Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ:VNOM) is a natural resources company focused on owning royalty and mineral interests in the Permian Basin. Based in Texas, the company derives revenue passively […]

headline: Viper Energy Closes Sitio Deal, Raises Q3 Production Outlook
summary: VNOM completes Sitio merger, boosting Q3 oil output outlook and positioning itself as a minerals and royalties leader.

headline: Should You Hold Diamondback Energy (FANG) for the Long Term?
summary: Artisan Partners, an investment management company, released its “Artisan Value Fund” second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Equity markets faced significant volatility in the second quarter, fueled by the announcement and subsequent pause of the “Liberation Day” tariffs. headline: Does Diamondback Energy Offer Opportunity After Year-To-Date Drop and $26B Endeavor Deal?
summary: Here is the revised article text with em dashes removed and the formatting improved: If you are watching Diamondback Energy and wondering whether its recent movements are a reason to buy, hold, or sell, you are definitely not alone. The stock has seen a few bumps on the road this year, down more than 17% year-to-date and off about 26% over the past twelve months. But these numbers only tell part of the story. Dig a little deeper, and you will spot signs of resilience and growth, such as the...
